summary: Build a DESVA boutique product website with categorized product listings (bouquets, frames/memories, bookmarks, cards, cute accessories), specific pricing/descriptions, a Shop Now order submission form (with optional image upload), and a contact section (Instagram DM button), following a soft pastel/white luxury minimal aesthetic. Email notifications are explicitly skipped.
architectural_notes: Email notification system is skipped/disabled; do not implement automatic order emails.

existing_features.title: Add the uploaded product images as frontend static assets and map them to the correct catalog items in the same order provided (1st through 11th image for the first 11 catalog items; all images after the 11th for the Cute Accessories section).

Update the Bouquet Collection page to match the requested pricing labels and values: Ribbon Flower Bouquet (Normal ₹89, Premium ₹119), Artificial Flower Bouquet (Normal ₹89, Premium ₹119), Natural Flower Bouquet (Normal ₹89, Premium ₹119), and Pipe Cleaner Flower Bouquet (Normal ₹199, Premium ₹249, Customized Premium ₹299+), and display the note: "Final pricing depends on customization."

Add a new section/page titled "Frames & Memory Keepsakes" that includes: Polaroid Prints pricing (Square ₹9, Rectangle ₹9, Large ₹11) with the 7th uploaded image; Polaroid Book pricing (8 Photos ₹99, 16 Photos ₹199) with the 8th uploaded image and description "Compact memory book printed in premium quality."; Magazine Style Memory Album pricing (4 Pages ₹499, 8 Pages ₹599) with the 9th uploaded image and description "Customized magazine-style photo album with elegant layout."; and include the mapped product images in an Instagram-style grid layout.

Update/extend the Polaroids area to include two bouquet products with their mapped images and descriptions: "Polaroid Bouquet" (Starting from ₹349; description "Creative bouquet made using polaroid memories.") using the 5th uploaded image, and "Customized Polaroid Bouquet" (Starting from ₹549; description "Fully customized polaroid bouquet tailored to theme and memory selection.") using the 6th uploaded image.
Update the Bookmarks page to ensure it uses the 10th uploaded image and shows "Starting from ₹49" plus the provided description text in English.
Update the Customized Cards page to ensure it uses the 11th uploaded image and shows "Starting from ₹249" plus the provided description text in English.

Create a "Handcrafted Cute Essentials" section/page that displays all images uploaded after the 11th image in an Instagram-style product grid, and apply the provided image presentation rules (soft white aesthetic background, subtle shadow, centered, high-resolution, keep original product color/quality, luxury boutique product photography style).

Enhance the "Shop Now" order submission system (currently Custom Orders) so customers can: select product, choose category, select quantity, add customization details, upload images (if required), enter name, phone number, email, and enter delivery date; and submit via a "Submit Order" button. Keep all user-facing text in English.

Add a Contact section on the site that displays Instagram "@_the.desva_" and email "thedesvaofficial@gmail.com", and includes a button labeled "DM Us on Instagram" that links to https://instagram.com/_the.desva_ in a new tab.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add product catalog sections with specified items, pricing tiers, and descriptions (Bouquets; Frames & Memory Keepsakes; Bookmarks; Customized Cards; Cute Accessories) using the uploaded images in the given order.

Implement image presentation/processing requirements for product images: keep original product colors/quality; replace background with soft white aesthetic; add subtle shadow; high-resolution; center-aligned; luxury boutique product photography style (especially for Cute Accessories images after the 11th upload).
Create 'Shop Now' order submission system: select product/category, quantity, customization details, upload images if required, customer name/phone/email, delivery date, and a 'Submit Order' button.
Add Contact section with Instagram @_the.desva_ and email thedesvaofficial@gmail.com, including a 'DM Us on Instagram' button.

Apply site-wide design/style: soft pastel + white theme, clean minimal layout, elegant typography, Instagram-style product grid, smooth scroll animation, premium spacing, luxury handmade boutique feel; add 'Why Choose DESVA' section and footer text 'Made with Love by DESVA'.

Update the backend CustomOrder data model and submission API to store the new order fields (product, category, phone number, email, customization details, and uploaded image references/data as applicable), while preserving existing order retrieval functionality (sorted by timestamp).
